subject: Breeders' Cup (Horse Race)
Curlin (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Horses
lead_paragraph: Raven’s Pass, a 3-year-old colt, beat Curlin, the 4-to-5 favorite, down the homestretch to win the $5 million race in record time, 1:59.27.
snippet: Raven’s Pass, a 3-year-old colt, beat Curlin, the 4-to-5 favorite, down the homestretch to win the $5 million race in record time, 1:59.27.
